eventDecorators.name: DrawDown
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a successful drawn down of vesting tokens is made. Emitted when setting contract parameters.

eventDecorators.name: ScheduleCreated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a vesting schedule is created. Emitted when setting contract parameters.

functionDecorators.name: availableDrawDownAmount
functionDecorators.description: Draw down amount currently available (based on the block timestamp).

functionDecorators.name: createVestingSchedule
functionDecorators.description: Create a new vesting scheduleA transfer is used to bring tokens into the VestingDepositAccount so pre-approval is required.

functionDecorators.name: createVestingSchedules
functionDecorators.description: Create new vesting schedules in a batchA transfer is used to bring tokens into the VestingDepositAccount so pre-approval is required. array index of address should be the same as the array index of the amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiaries
parameterDecorators.description: array of beneficiaries of the vested tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: array of amount of tokens (in wei).

functionDecorators.name: drawDown
functionDecorators.description: Draws down any vested tokens due. Must be called directly by the beneficiary assigned the tokens in the schedule.

functionDecorators.name: end
functionDecorators.description: end of vesting period as a timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: lastDrawnAt
functionDecorators.description: last drawn down time (seconds) per beneficiary.

returnDecorators.description: _remainingBalance tokens still due (and currently locked) from vesting schedule.

functionDecorators.name: start
functionDecorators.description: start of vesting period as a timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: tokenBalance
functionDecorators.description: Vested token balance for a beneficiary. Must be called directly by the beneficiary assigned the tokens in the schedule.

returnDecorators.description: _tokenBalance total balance proxied via the ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: totalDrawn
functionDecorators.description: cumulative total of tokens drawn down (and transferred from the deposit account) per beneficiary.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership roleChanges the owner of this contract to a new address. Only owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: beneficiary to vest remaining tokens to.

functionDecorators.name: vestedAmount
functionDecorators.description: amount vested for a beneficiary. Note beneficiary address can not be reused.

functionDecorators.name: vestingScheduleForBeneficiary
functionDecorators.description: Vesting schedule and associated data for a beneficiary. Must be called directly by the beneficiary assigned the tokens in the schedule.
